Name: Xenociders
About the game: Xenociders is a stealth action VR shooter set on a lush planet ruled by ferocious alien dinosaur predators. Hide. Hunt. Be hunted. You’re the sole survivor of a shuttle crash on a deadly alien world. Explore a series of wide regions and find a way to go back to orbit, to safety. Observe your surroundings. Stay low. Sneak your way through the vegetation and avoid engaging the dinosaur-like predators. And if it comes to you or them, your weapons pack a serious punch so fight it out till the end! Key Features A vast alien jungle ruled by dinosaur-like deadly, vicious predators. Explore the lushest jungle ever seen in VR. Stay hidden! Stealth is key to survival. Know your surroundings, recon the area and plot a course that will keep you out of harm’s way. Not a wave shooter! Predators will employ challenging strategies to wear your group down. Explore a beautiful, lush world in VR. Weapons that pack a punch! From assault rifles to energy bows, weapons are deadly, precise and satisfying.
